value:
It's a strange ask to learn the way of
the ninja...but I'll do my best since
it's now my role at the festival.

Remembering faces is a skill I learned
as a mercenary. I should be able to
put it to use as a ninja too.

Ninja also carry around preserved
food. No matter the discipline, it's
hard to fight on an empty stomach.

This garb is flexible and allows for
quiet travel. I see, it's meant to aid
in the success of covert operations.

We should investigate that
strange house over there...
Let's move very discreetly.

Yes, I'm dressed like a ninja, and yes,
I come with a coded message. But I'm
just a mercenary.

So this is how to maintain a ninja's
blade? Sword arts and ninja teachings
are comparable, that's for sure.

Feels like I'm starting to
get used to being a ninja.

Completely hiding my presence
is a pretty hard thing to do...

Ah, so this is the way of the ninja.
How interesting.

My name is Zihark. I'm dressed as a...
ninja? It's not my usual line of work,
but I'll do my best.

I was asked to participate in this ninja
festival and studied up on the craft
to make my act look more believable.$k$pSo get this. To succeed, you must
employ tactics contrary to what
works in swordplay.$k$pLight-footed ninja concealed by the
dark of night bring down foes and
then slip away totally undetected...$k$pColor me impressed. It's nice to be
reminded of how much knowledge
you can gain by trying new things.$k$pI owe it to you. If the opportunity
presents itself, then invite me to
the next festival.
てやっ
仕留める！
ぐっ…
甘かったか…
That all you've got?
You're mine!
Just part of the job.
Luck is not on your side!
I've failed...
ふっ
I'm Zihark, and I'm dressed this way for a reason. You'll just have to trust me.
Ah, it's you. Enjoying the festival, I see.
Being a ninja has its perks. If the enemy can't read your movements, they don't know where to guard.
I'm confident in my swordplay. Send me into battle and you will be too.
There sure are a lot of ninja around here, huh? Hoshido must be pretty powerful...
Seeing beorc and laguz enjoying this festival together is truly something special.
As long as you're giving the orders, I'll follow through.
Got it.
Now what?
Let's go.
